Title: Relates to the number of prior suspensions needed to qualify for aggravated unlicensed operation in the first degree; repealer
Summary: Reduces the number of prior suspensions needed to qualify for aggravated unlicensed operation in the first degree from ten or more suspensions to five or more suspensions which have to be imposed on at least five separate dates.
LawCode: Amd §511, rpld sub 2 ¶(a) sub¶ (iv), V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the number of prior suspensions needed to qualify for aggravated unlicensed operation in the first degree; and to repeal subparagraph (iv) of paragraph (a) of subdivision 2 of section 511 of such law relating thereto
